title: "another instance of this launcher is running..."
body:
I've been getting this error for the past ~2 months now. The only fix I've found is to uninstall and reinstall. Even that, however, is not always effective. Sometimes I need to uninstall and reinstall multiple times before I can load it up and play. I've tried closing out my firewalls, I've tried closing single, multiple, and all league related applications - including rads_user_kernal. Nothing works except for uninstalling and reinstalling - even that only works for that one session; once I log out I cannot log back in. 

I'm using:
Win 10 64 bit
i5-6600 @ 3.3GHz
16gb ram
AMD Radeo R9 390 @16.4.1 sofware version

What do I need to do to fix this. It is very frustrating waiting hours for the patches to finish downloading every time I want to play.

replies.body:
This is something I have seen a few people post about, but it seems more recent of an issue.  When you close League of Legends normally, is there any instance of League of Legends running in your Process List at all that shouldn't be given you closed it down?  Additionally, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104) so that we can rule out any OS permissions as a possible root cause.

Reply back and let me know!
